text:
@SpeakerPelosi Section. 7. All Bills for raising Revenue shall
originate in the House of Representatives. Nancy, since you knew some much sooner than Trump the coronavirus was a huge problem and in your opinion, Trump wasn’t on top of it. Why did Trump have to ask for funding?
